text: Comprehensive legislation is obviously preferable. They should not, however, disdain this opportunity of obtaining a useful sample of parliamentary opinion by at least allowing these Bills a fair run. Centigrade v. Fahrenheit. The fight is on. The challenger has behind it not only the authority of the SECRETARY of STATE for AIR but also the backing of the DIRECTOR GENERAL of the Meteorological Office.
